alert.note: Alert for Brazoria Islands; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Coastal Matagorda; Galveston Island; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris; Inland Matagorda; Matagorda Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Galveston, Brazoria, east central Matagorda and southeastern Harris Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 914 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Surfside Beach, moving north at 35 to 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Pasadena, League City, Galveston Causeway, Galveston Island West End, Texas City, southern Friendswood, Lake Jackson, Alvin, Angleton, Dickinson, La Marque, Santa Fe, Freeport, Seabrook, Clute, Webster, Hitchcock, West Columbia, Sweeny and Kemah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
